name: autodetect-generated-files
description: Automatically marks generated files based on regex or .gitattributes.

autodetectGenerated.regexPatterns.description: List of regex patterns to match in the first few lines of the file to identify it as generated.

autodetectGenerated.gitAttributes.description: List of .gitattributes keys to check. If a file has one of these attributes set, it is marked as generated.

autodetectGenerated.excludePatterns.description: List of glob patterns to exclude from being marked as generated, even if they match other criteria.

autodetectGenerated.maxSearchLines.description: Maximum number of lines to search for regex patterns in the beginning of the file. Set to 0 to disable line-based limiting and rely only on character limit.

autodetectGenerated.maxSearchChars.description: Maximum number of characters to search for regex patterns in the beginning of the file. Set to 0 to search the entire file.

scripts.prek: npm run lint && npm run format:fix && npm run test
